page.title: 08Rachel's day
page.content: On Saturday I played in my paddock. I couldn't play with my friend because she was buying a pony. So I played tennis with my mum. Then I had a barbecue (food cooked on a fire outside). I had lots of different kinds of meat, then strawberries and cream. I made some hideouts with my sister Ruth. Then I went on my swings and watched my mum on the tractor cutting the grass. My mum found a fieldmouse under the tractor, but it was alright. Then I called my dad; he tried to find it but he trod on it and it died. My mum burst into tears. Then I watched telly and went to bed. I read my book and mum forgot about me. I read till 10 o'clock and I nodded off to sleep. Rachel Dodsley (aged 8)
